revised_title: A Study on the Skull Structure and Development in Mammalia: Part II - Edentata
tldr: The author, William Kitchen Parker, examines the skull structure and development in the mammalian class Edentata, focusing on the family Dasypodidae (Armadillos). The study aims to provide a better understanding of the mammalian skull and its classification, using a collection of embryos and early young specimens from various types of mammals.
